name: South Nepean Muslim Community (SNMC)
description: A vibrant Islamic community center serving the South Nepean area of Ottawa, providing prayer facilities, educational programs, and community services.

name: Kanata Muslim Association (KMA)
description: Serving the Muslim community in Kanata with prayer services, youth programs, and community outreach initiatives.

name: Ottawa Muslim Association (OMA)
description: One of Ottawa's largest and oldest Muslim community centers, offering comprehensive services including prayer, education, and social programs.

name: Islamic Centre of Canada - Ottawa (ICCO)
description: A prominent Islamic center providing religious services, educational programs, and community support to Muslims in the Ottawa region.

name: Khalid Bin Al-Walid Mosque
description: A welcoming mosque in Ottawa providing daily prayers, Friday Jummah services, Islamic education, and community events for all ages.

name: Assunnah Muslims Association (AMA)
description: Providing Islamic education, prayer services, and community programs to Muslims in the Ottawa area with a focus on authentic Islamic teachings.

name: Jami Omar Mosque
description: A community mosque in Ottawa dedicated to serving Muslims through daily prayers, Islamic education, youth programs, and charitable activities.

name: Orleans Islamic Centre
description: Serving the growing Muslim community in Orleans and East Ottawa with prayer facilities, weekend school, and various community programs.

name: UNICEF
description: The United Nations Children's Fund works to save children's lives, defend their rights, and help them fulfill their potential around the world.

name: International Red Cross
description: Providing humanitarian aid, disaster relief, and emergency assistance to people in crisis around the world.

name: Islamic Relief Canada
description: Providing emergency relief and development programs to vulnerable communities worldwide, guided by Islamic values of compassion and justice.

name: Human Concern International
description: A Canadian charity providing humanitarian aid and sustainable development programs to communities in need across the globe.

name: Doctors Without Borders
description: An international medical humanitarian organization providing emergency medical care in conflict zones and areas affected by epidemics and disasters.

name: World Wildlife Fund
description: Conserving nature and reducing the most pressing threats to the diversity of life on Earth through science-based conservation efforts.

name: Greenpeace
description: An independent global campaigning organization that acts to change attitudes and behavior, to protect and conserve the environment.

name: Nature Conservancy of Canada
description: Canada's leading land conservation organization, working to protect our most important natural areas and the species they sustain.

name: David Suzuki Foundation
description: Working to protect the environment and find solutions that will create a sustainable Canada through science, education, and advocacy.

name: Ocean Conservancy
description: Working to protect the ocean from today's greatest global challenges through science-based solutions for a healthy ocean and thriving communities.
